Package services

Class DB

java.lang.Object
services.DB
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actions
public class DB
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actions
Allows to perform operations with database that have following properties: db, username, password, conn.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String db
    Name of the database.
    private java.lang.String password
    Password that allows to get an access to the database.
    private java.lang.String port
    Database port.
    private java.lang.String username
    Username that allows to get an access to the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DB()
    Creates new object of DB with default database name, port and user credentials.
    DB​(java.lang.String port, java.lang.String dbName, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
    Creates new object of DB with given database name and user credentials and establish connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createNewTable​(java.lang.String tableName)
    Creates a table for storing statistics if it does not exist yet.
    void deleteFromDB​(java.lang.String tableName)
    Clears a specified table.
    java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String port, java.lang.String dbName)
    Creates URL-address of the database with UTF-8 encoding that supports different languages.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getFromDB​(java.lang.String tableName)
    Retrieves data from a specified table.
    void writeToDB​(java.lang.String tableName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> words)
    Creates a query with "insert" statement.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DB

      public DB()
      Creates new object of DB with default database name, port and user credentials.

    • DB

      public DB​(java.lang.String port, java.lang.String dbName, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Creates new object of DB with given database name and user credentials and establish connection.
      Parameters:
      port - Database port.
      dbName - Name of the database.
      username - Username that allows to get an access to the database.
      password - Password that allows to get an access to the database.

  • Method Details

    • format

      public java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String port, java.lang.String dbName)
      Creates URL-address of the database with UTF-8 encoding that supports different languages.
      Parameters:
      port - Database port.
      dbName - Name of the database.
      Returns:
      URL in a string format.

    • createNewTable

      public void createNewTable​(java.lang.String tableName)
      Creates a table for storing statistics if it does not exist yet.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table.

    • writeToDB

      public void writeToDB​(java.lang.String tableName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> words)
      Creates a query with "insert" statement. and writes every entry of the map into a table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table.
      words - Map with two fields: String key and Integer value.

    • getFromDB

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getFromDB​(java.lang.String tableName)
      Retrieves data from a specified table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table.
      Returns:
      Wordname and number of occurrences for each one.

    • deleteFromDB

      public void deleteFromDB​(java.lang.String tableName)
      Clears a specified table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table.
